title: [ICE] Panic in nightly rustc

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I ran into a compiler panic when running "cargo test" on this code: https://github.com/phayes/tallyman/tree/rustc-panic (Note the branch should be set to `rustc-panic` where I've captured the code to reproduce). Command: `RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test --verbose` Version: `rustc 1.32.0-nightly (36a50c29f 2018-11-09)`
Click to See Output

```bash Running `rustc --crate-name tallyman src/lib.rs --color always --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 --test -C metadata=95fefe54bc9ff9d5 -C extra-filename=-95fefe54bc9ff9d5 --out-dir /opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps --extern criterion=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libcriterion-3cac9f334f9acfdb.rlib --extern hashbrown=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libhashbrown-4706f59c6229c73c.rlib --extern indexmap=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libindexmap-07356c32826f0cb2.rlib --extern petgraph=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libpetgraph-bd297f9bae4e71fb.rlib --extern rand=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/librand-c77e94346eea64e2.rlib` warning: unused import: `std::cmp::Ordering` --> src/stv.rs:2:5 | 2 | use std::cmp::Ordering; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: #[warn(unused_imports)] on by default thread 'main' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 436 but the index is 436', /rustc/36a50c29f6c5c386fba6ab685818755ac55152e5/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:2448:10 stack backtrace: 0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace 1: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print 2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} 3: std::panicking::default_hook 4: rustc::util::common::panic_hook 5: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook 6: std::panicking::continue_panic_fmt 7: rust_begin_unwind 8: core::panicking::panic_fmt 9: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check 10: as serialize::serialize::SpecializedDecoder>::specialized_decode 11: serialize::serialize::Decoder::read_struct 12: serialize::serialize::Decoder::read_seq 13: serialize::serialize::Decoder::read_struct 14: serialize::serialize::Decoder::read_seq 15: as serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{{closure}} 16: rustc::ty::query::on_disk_cache::OnDiskCache::try_load_query_result 17: as rustc::ty::query::config::QueryDescription<'tcx>>::try_load_from_disk 18: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::>::try_get_query 19: rustc::ty::>::instance_mir 20: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 21: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 22: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items::{{closure}} 23: rustc::util::common::time 24: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 25: rustc::util::common::time 26: rustc_mir::monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 27: rustc::ty::query:: for rustc::ty::query::queries::collect_and_partition_mono_items<'tcx>>::compute 28: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_context 29: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 30: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 31: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::>::force_query_with_job 32: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::>::get_query 33: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::codegen_crate 34: ::codegen_crate 35: rustc::util::common::time 36: rustc_driver::driver::phase_4_codegen 37: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input::{{closure}} 38: rustc::ty::context::tls::enter_context 39: >::with 40: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::create_and_enter 41: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input 42: rustc_driver::run_compiler_with_pool 43: >::set 44: rustc_driver::run_compiler 45: syntax::with_globals 46: __rust_maybe_catch_panic 47: rustc_driver::run 48: rustc_driver::main 49: std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}} 50: std::panicking::try::do_call 51: __rust_maybe_catch_panic 52: std::rt::lang_start_internal 53: main query stack during panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.32.0-nightly (36a50c29f 2018-11-09) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: Could not compile `tallyman`. Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name tallyman src/lib.rs --color always --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 --test -C metadata=95fefe54bc9ff9d5 -C extra-filename=-95fefe54bc9ff9d5 --out-dir /opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps --extern criterion=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libcriterion-3cac9f334f9acfdb.rlib --extern hashbrown=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libhashbrown-4706f59c6229c73c.rlib --extern indexmap=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libindexmap-07356c32826f0cb2.rlib --extern petgraph=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/libpetgraph-bd297f9bae4e71fb.rlib --extern rand=/opt/tallyman/target/debug/deps/librand-c77e94346eea64e2.rlib` (exit code: 101) ```
